cheatsheet.title: Import a project generated from SDD

intro.description: The following steps show how to import a project generated by SDD.

item.title: Import
item.description: From the Navigator View, right-click and select the option Import or use the menu File -> Import. Choose General -> Existing Projects into Workspace. Click on Next. Browse and select your Project folder. Click on Finish Choose General -> Existing Projects into Workspace. Click on Next. Browse and select your Project folder. Click on Finish

item.title: Explore the project structure
item.description: Explore in the Navigator view the newly imported project file structure.ect file structure.
